channel.title: No prices.txt in hyperion?
channel.description: Okay, I know this is server-sided, but I checked my server files, backup files, client files, cache files, can't find where prices are... It's not in cfg folder or anything, i've tried searching aswell.

item.title: No prices.txt in hyperion?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

hyperion =/= PI
PI is the only serverbase using a txt for prices.
I don’t know where it’s located for hyperion though, maybe it just written in java, or loading via xml files

Read full topic
